description.en:
The Companies and Intellectual Property Commission (CIPC) is responsible for company registration in South Africa. Users need to log in to https://bizportal.gov.za/ to perform a business search.

"Functions of the Commission:

- The CIPC does registration of companies, co-operatives and intellectual property rights (trade marks, patents, designs and copyright) and maintenance thereof.
- Disclosure of Information on its business registers" [1] 

[1] https://www.cipc.co.za/?page_id=685

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds:
According to the CIPC eservices site, users need to log in to perform a company search.

The OpenCorporates database can also be searched for South African organisations: https://opencorporates.com/companies/za?page=1.
